column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: A man went out to cast his net for fish as usual
column4: but caught an AK rifle instead at 2:40 pm on September 27
column5: 2020 in a pond near Borey Phonsui in Chrey Kong village
column6: Choam Chao Ty commune 2 Khan Por Senchey
column7: Phnom Penh.------According to the source the fisherman was surprised when he pulled in a blue bag to dry land. With suspicion
column8: he picked it up and saw an AK rifle inside. Police were called. ------POST NEWS------*It’s not clear exactly which AK type it is
column9: but doesn’t appear to have been in the water for too long
column10: when compared with similar weapons that have been found from the wars of the 1970’s-90’s.
